showerReviews.reviewText: THIS is what MY shower experience was like: ( plz excuse any mess as I had JUST got done cleaning up) For those who uses ANY of the truck stops SHOWERS on a daily regular basis, THIS shower was ALOT more ROOMIER, hot water temp was ACTUALLY ‚Ä¶

Couldn‚Äôt park in paid parking I paid for.  Paajd shower. Well points because I spend a butt load of money on fuel at ta.  Disgusting. I left get what ya pay for. Doesn‚Äôt matter using up points because new fuel card also loves. Will pay ‚Ä¶
Interesting store with lots of random offerings. The design was a little strange and mismatched but it was clean. Lots of trucker needs as well as a shower. Attached to restaurant

‚Ä¶ shutdown the mens and women's restrooms at 3:00 in the afternoon when there were 2 Greyhound busses outside and drivers coming in. Everybody had to use shower 7 which you can imagine was a nightmare with 15 people standing around waiting. ‚Ä¶
I am costume for 6 month not shower available showers pointes no altar one point available fast time very bad experience so I am very guilty feel this is not good &very bad

If I could put 0 stars it be fair i shower has cold water and the ceiling fan keep blowing cold air freezied almost to the dead parking is place is the worst  ever road are damage how can truck drivers be happy with this place when you have ‚Ä¶

Paid for parking at 330pm on Sunday. Shower was good. Boston Market was yum
Fuel to expensive. Employee walking around making sure drivers are paying for their reserved spot.

Very nice people and helpful, parking Is good has a gravel lot below but it's nice size and well maintained. Shower was awesome had two showers side by side and 2 sinks very well maintained and clean like a hospital. Food was country pride ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ all the QR codes are invalid. So you have to use quarters, but the quarter machine is down. When you try to use the TA kiosk to get a shower it's not working either. The employees are nice but the place is in desperate need of an update.
‚Ä¶ I didn't planned to stay there overnight, I just needed to get a shower. 18:00 no any spot available on free parking and couple trucks sitting on "reserved". ‚Ä¶

I don't know what your problem is with the warm water, but it's time to fix it. I have been here for three days and for three days the water in the shower is slightly warm. I pay money for this shower and I want the damn warm water!!!!!

I was looking for the restroom, asking for help, The lady by the showers said, what do you need and what do you want know. Left me confused, no way to talk to a customer, let alone a truck driver who is exhausted. Waited a while to use the ‚Ä¶

Not the best Loves, but not the worst. More of a stop for truckers rather than regular cars. There is a lot of trucker merch and even a shower. Overall the store was a little junky but it was pretty clean.

‚Ä¶ I had the misfortune of booking a shower here, and it was a nightmare. I waited in line as four showers sat filthy and empty for 30 minutes. Employees didn‚Äôt bother to clean them, even as a crowd of people waited, confused and frustrated. A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ come on a Sunday Goodluck finding parking. Parking lot stays full all day unless you get lucky. Showers were full most of the day I had 7 people in front of me and waited 2 hours for my shower. Pizza inside was good because I got it ‚Ä¶

There were gaps between people waiting for showers on a Tuesday. Manager and worker acted paranoid about emptying the showers quickly even though it was not busy as a weekend and it started to slow down even more as I finished. I own two ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Well, what can I say. On weekends the showers are prepared at the usual pace, just like everywhere else. I‚Äôd also like to highlight that they keep track of the reserved spots, putting out cones and so on, so there‚Äôs always parking available ‚Ä¶

So this is a new one. If you reserved a shower DON'T UPDATE YOUR NUMBER on the app! It'll make you get back to the end of the line smh. I had 3 people in front of me then I updated my number to receive texts messages about my shower only to ‚Ä¶

Parking is pretty full and hard to get into. The parking lot is disgusting, trash everywhere and chunks out of the pavement in places. The shower wasn't very clean. The restrooms are very clean. McDonald's is good. The convenience store is ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ polite, and some of them are at the wrong place. You have security going around looking if you paid for parking and ignoring vehicles that are not supposed to be here. All in all, avoid if you can. Surprisingly, the shower was spotless.

‚Ä¶ matter of fact.  Bathrooms, well, they got a little out of line. I told the manager with the bears about it and he went and got that squared away immediately. Shower!! Look, we all know how it goes; It‚Äôs either really hot and low pressure ‚Ä¶

This truck stop is probably the worst in the United States. I was waiting around 3 hours for take a shower. I will not come back anymore. 10 drivers waiting to shower and they have 3 showers open and no one is cleaning them. It's ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The 2 gentlemen who I saw cleaning the showers  tonight bring this rating from a 1 star to a 4 star. Twice I‚Äôve had to shower here, both times the showers were very clean, clean towels, and hot water. ‚Ä¶
Drivers, stop paying to park. We need more free truck parking in the area... 10x what there is now. Takes 2 to 4 hours for a shower to be available and they suck.

Absolutely the worst management I've seen in a truck stop.
Argumentative and dismissive and out right rude.
The outside look of this Amazon bobtail location is yucky enough I will not even attempt a shower.

After driving 20 miles out of route to this location, I waited for four hours for my shower. I called to see if there was an issue and got no answer. I called customer service and was told my app was outdated, it's the latest version. I ‚Ä¶

Always full on parking, there's so much labs around they could expand considering how much truck traffic is here. But they have McDonald's.
The building is under construction at the moment but it's clean, showers are all working and turn around time is amazing. In 15 minutes 4 guests were cleared.

They only have 2 showers and the water wouldn‚Äôt get hot. What made me even more mad is that they wouldn‚Äôt let my husband and I take a shower together so we had to pay $30 for 2 showers üò°. They have a washer and dryer. And 3 restaurants. Tac ‚Ä¶

The laundry dried my clothes. The shower had hot water. The pizza didn‚Äôt get me sick. All these things make me happy. I was even happy about the id exchange for towels so I didn‚Äôt suffer towel abuse. I needed these things. I was a little ‚Ä¶
Good everything else was great went to shower and no hot water and they knew that and didn‚Äôt tell and still charged me why I give it one star

‚Ä¶ . Charge 20 per night for spots. Make you leave your I'd for towels. Will ask if you are a couple then tell you that you can Not enter the shower at the same time.. When we asked for a manager to ask why you can't shower together so one ‚Ä¶

Can‚Äôt get free shower. misusing the loyal truck drivers. After fueling 110 plus gallons and spending $30 plus dollars in drinks and food the cashier tells me it‚Äôs either parking or shower. Unbelievable

The staff was friendly.   But when me and my fiancee went to take a shower before we hit the road they said we couldn't take a shower together.   We always take a shower together.   At home or on the road.  And I tried some samples of their ‚Ä¶
First hour free. Zero free spots. Showers $15 or shower credit earned with 75 ga. Diesel pitchase

‚Ä¶ parking, but not much TT parking. They have a CAT scale. Food is great! Pepperoni pie ratio off, too much sauce to pepp/cheese, but still tasty. They have showers, but idk how clean they are (I didn't shower). Will return when in the area!
Don't buy wifi. it's too slow to use. Log waiting time for a shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ see the potential in the future. Good spacing for parking, granted it‚Äôs still under construction and the store fronts have yet to be filled but still has all you need from shower, restrooms and a store. Now one thing is the stalls in ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower and a meal. So nice here, the staff is super friendly, very nice new showers. Had delicious catfish for lunch and met the Boss himself. Will stop here as often as I can. Support this Truckstop!
‚Ä¶ But, I was let down by the quality of the showers. I tried the standard shower and my husband tried the premium shower. ‚Ä¶

all time favourite truck stop
very well maintained and outstanding service
all staff members are nice and friendly.
restroom and shower are luxury. 10 out of 10.
also provide free truck wash for first time and free parking.

‚Ä¶ parked on the south end by an rv park? The shower area is semi close to that, but the food court is clear on the other side of the complex, and a complex is the best way to describe this, it‚Äôs huge. So it‚Äôs a pretty good trek to the ‚Äúfood ‚Ä¶

Recommend this place to all of our fellow truckers out there if you are nearby because it has plenty of parking, shower, food court and all the amenities for us and also soon they are going to be open other good stuff for our convenience. N ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Great Tacos and Breakfast burritos. Clean Restroom. $20 parking though, and the hot sauce will give you 2 days (so far) of the Burning Hershey Squirts.

Ah good place to stop they do honor mudflap ,HOWEVER if you fill up no shower no free food have to pay cash to get a shower , also you have to pay for parking . Other than that its a good place to eat nice clean Mexican food.

I didn't pay to park here any longer than thirty minutes. The paid parking is terrible for truck drivers but I can't speak on that. I will tell you that the tacos and breakfast items.. are absolutely fantastic. The lot is clean, staff is super friendly.

‚Ä¶ for a bathroom break and to grab a few drinks and snacks. She also is pleased with the store. It's very clean here and the staff was friendly. We haven't had the chance to shower here yet but when we do there will be an update to my review.

Excellent spot to do a reset. Clean store/facility/lot. $12 shower. Friendly staff. Has Subway and Wendy's. Has excellent hot fresh food options for cheap. Mostly breakfast and regular tacos with various protein options and sides and pizza. ‚Ä¶

Swung in here a couple of times to get a shower. Both times shower was CLEAN! I'm talking blue water in the toilet, empty trash can, squeaky floors CLEAN! I will continue to stop and spend my money here. Staff is extremely helpful and ‚Ä¶
The best food and worker, my trucker friends you got to stop by and get a plate shower, fuel and see Ms NaNa she the best good home cook food‚Ä¶ I love ya

Grand opening February 8th @ 12pm
80 Truck parking,  6 Shower
Tejas Taco, Wendy's, Subway, Dan's Pizza, Road Ranger Kitchen
8 Diesel lanes

I don't know what your problem is with the warm water, but it's time to fix it. I have been here for three days and for three days the water in the shower is slightly warm. I pay money for this shower and I want the damn warm water!!!!!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ especially with a trailer. There is "No Overnight parking". If you want to shower, this place does not offer that service. If you need to take a 30, it may be ok for that but once again space is limited. More convenient for bobtail or ‚Ä¶
Not a truck stop, no shower! What a shame

‚Ä¶ truck, you'll be fine here. If you're pulling a wagon then keep moving. Also expect to wake in the morning blocked in by one of your caring fellow drivers.  As far as the store is concerned, it's not a bad stop. No shower. Plenty to eat.

‚Ä¶ corporate speak just pushes people off more. You did NOT build this as a convenience,  you built this TO MAKE MONEY! YOU HAVE ROOM FOR CHATCHKIES AND ALL KINDS OF BS USELESS PRODUCTS....YOU HAVE ROOM FOR AT LEAST ONE FREAKING SHOWER!!
Good location, clean restrooms, good and professional staffs, no restaurant but u can get good snacks,no shower, few parkings.
